verses.verse: <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, <S%H215>shine<s%>; for thy <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>, and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2224>risen<s%> upon thee. shine: or, be enlightened; for thy light cometh

For, behold, the <S%H2822>darkness<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and gross <S%H6205>darkness<s%> the <S%H3816>people<s%>: but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H2224>arise<s%> upon thee, and his <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall be <S%H7200>seen<s%> upon thee.
And the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> shall <S%H1980>come<s%> to thy <S%H216>light<s%>, and <S%H4428>kings<s%> to the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> of thy <S%H2225>rising<s%>.

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%>: all they gather themselves <S%H6908>together<s%>, they <S%H935>come<s%> to thee: thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H7350>far<s%>, and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H539>nursed<s%> at thy <S%H6654>side<s%>.

Then thou shalt <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3372><s%>, and flow <S%H5102>together<s%>, and thine <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H6342>fear<s%>, and be <S%H7337>enlarged<s%>; because the <S%H1995>abundance<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall be <S%H2015>converted<s%> unto thee, the <S%H2428>forces<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee. abundance: or, noise of the sea shall be turned toward thee forces: or, wealth

The <S%H8229>multitude<s%> of <S%H1581>camels<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> thee, the <S%H1070>dromedaries<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> and <S%H5891>Ephah<s%>; all they from <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%>: they shall <S%H5375>bring<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3828>incense<s%>; and they shall shew <S%H1319>forth<s%> the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

All the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> shall be gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> unto thee, the <S%H352>rams<s%> of <S%H5032>Nebaioth<s%> shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto thee: they shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> with <S%H7522>acceptance<s%> on mine <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and I will <S%H6286>glorify<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H8597>glory<s%>.
Who are these that <S%H5774>fly<s%> as a <S%H5645>cloud<s%>, and as the <S%H3123>doves<s%> to their <S%H699>windows<s%>?

Surely the <S%H339>isles<s%> shall <S%H6960>wait<s%> for me, and the <S%H591>ships<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%>, to <S%H935>bring<s%> thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> from <S%H7350>far<s%>, their <S%H3701>silver<s%> and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> with them, unto the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and to the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, because he hath <S%H6286>glorified<s%> thee.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5236>strangers<s%> shall build <S%H1129>up<s%> thy <S%H2346>walls<s%>, and their <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto thee: for in my <S%H7110>wrath<s%> I <S%H5221>smote<s%> thee, but in my <S%H7522>favour<s%> have I had <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on thee.

Therefore thy <S%H8179>gates<s%> shall be <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>; they shall not be <S%H5462>shut<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> nor <S%H3915>night<s%>; that men may <S%H935>bring<s%> unto thee the <S%H2428>forces<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%>, and that their <S%H4428>kings<s%> may be <S%H5090>brought<s%>. forces: or, wealth
For the <S%H1471>nation<s%> and <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> that will not <S%H5647>serve<s%> thee shall <S%H6>perish<s%>; yea, those <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall be <S%H2717>utterly<s%> <S%H2717>wasted<s%>.

The <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee, the fir <S%H1265>tree<s%>, the pine <S%H8410>tree<s%>, and the <S%H8391>box<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, to <S%H6286>beautify<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>; and I will make the <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H3513>glorious<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> also of them that <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> thee shall <S%H1980>come<s%> <S%H7817>bending<s%> unto thee; and all they that <S%H5006>despised<s%> thee shall bow themselves <S%H7812>down<s%> at the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of thy <S%H7272>feet<s%>; and they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> thee, The <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, The <S%H6726>Zion<s%> of the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

<S%H8478>Whereas<s%> thou hast been <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> and <S%H8130>hated<s%>, so that no man went <S%H5674>through<s%> thee, I will <S%H7760>make<s%> thee an <S%H5769>eternal<s%> <S%H1347>excellency<s%>, a <S%H4885>joy<s%> of <S%H1755>many<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

Thou shalt also <S%H3243>suck<s%> the <S%H2461>milk<s%> of the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%>, and shalt <S%H3243>suck<s%> the <S%H7699>breast<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> am thy <S%H3467>Saviour<s%> and thy <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%>, the mighty <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

For <S%H5178>brass<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and for <S%H1270>iron<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and for <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and for <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%>: I will also <S%H7760>make<s%> thy <S%H6486>officers<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and thine <S%H5065>exactors<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

<S%H2555>Violence<s%> shall no more be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in thy <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H7701>wasting<s%> nor <S%H7667>destruction<s%> within thy <S%H1366>borders<s%>; but thou shalt <S%H7121>call<s%> thy <S%H2346>walls<s%> <S%H3444>Salvation<s%>, and thy <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H8416>Praise<s%>.

The <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall be no more thy <S%H216>light<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%>; neither for <S%H5051>brightness<s%> shall the <S%H3394>moon<s%> give <S%H216>light<s%> unto thee: but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be unto thee an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H215>light<s%>, and thy <S%H430>God<s%> thy <S%H8597>glory<s%>.

Thy <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall no more go <S%H935>down<s%>; neither shall thy <S%H3391>moon<s%> <S%H622>withdraw<s%> itself: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be thine <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H216>light<s%>, and the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H60>mourning<s%> shall be <S%H7999>ended<s%>.

Thy <S%H5971>people<s%> also shall be all <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: they shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, the <S%H5342>branch<s%> of my <S%H4302>planting<s%>, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%>, that I may be <S%H6286>glorified<s%>.

A little <S%H6996>one<s%> shall become a <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and a small <S%H6810>one<s%> a <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>: I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H2363>hasten<s%> it in his <S%H6256>time<s%>.
